title: All Ball - Former Notre Dame Guard Kyle McAlarney on Notre Dame, Euro Career, Adversity, NBA Player Training
itunes:title: All Ball - Former Notre Dame Guard Kyle McAlarney on Notre Dame, Euro Career, Adversity, NBA Player Training
description:
In this episode, Doug catches up with former Notre Dame Guard Kyle McAlarney discusses his path from Staten Island to South Bend as a highly touted recruit, a public arrest/suspension, his successful Euro career in the French league, and how he's staying in the game as a high school coach, NBA player trainer, and transitioning to being an agent. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
